content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"! Please pay attention\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to the described below cases that lead to a more complex procedure for vendor creating/unblocking:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Vendors with a Subcontractor type\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A subcontractor is a vendor that provides services on behalf of EPAM to a third party/EPAM’s customer (a subcontractor/representative of subcontractor often requires EPAM’s UPSA profile, email address, access to EPAM internal systems, laptop or workplace).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Payments will be prohibited to a Subcontractor until a fully executed contract is sent to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASubcontractors@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFASubcontractors@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAVendorManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAVendorManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please find the link to the kb portal where you can find the description of the process of cooperation with Subcontractors: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMFICOSC/EPM-FICO+Subcontractors+Home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPM-FICO Subcontractors Home\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Vendors with the category of Recruitment Agency\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recruitment Agency is a vendor that delivers employees for EPAM for a fee. It can be either a company or an individual.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to verify a vendor with the category Recruitment Agency the following doc/info should be provided to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAVendorManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAVendorManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\":\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Signed recruitment agreement with a vendor.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TA Head approval for a signed contract with a vendor.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please find the link to the kb portal where you can find the description of the process of cooperation with Recruiting Agencies vendors: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/Recruit/How+to+sign+a+contract+with+new+vendor\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Talent Acquisition Vendors (Recruitment Agencies) Process Flow\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Vendors who will be paid from USA EPAM legal entities\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you create a vendor who will be paid from USA EPAM legal entities, filled and signed a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"W-9 or W-8BEN (for individuals)/W-BEN-E (for companies) form\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" should be provided by a vendor. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Vendors with a Direct Debit payment method\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bank transfer (ACH/wire) is a preferred payment method in EPAM. It is preferable to avoid checks, credit cards or direct debit payments. Concerning the Direct Debit payment method, it is generally assigned only to vendors such as government entities, tax authorities, rent/utility, business critical services, or when we are contractually obligated. Also, for assigning a Direct Debit payment method to a vendor, the VM unit needs to receive a separate approval from the Treasury department.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.  Vendors with a Supplier type\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Existence of a contract for a vendor with a Supplier type is NOT mandatory for a vendor creation. But if it’s a strategic vendor or planned annual spend with a vendor is expected to be high (more than $80k), a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contract \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMGPRO/Translated+versions+of+Supplier+Code+of+Conduct+ready+for+Suppliers+signing\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supplier Code of Conduct\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" apparently needs to be signed. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In this case, before cooperation and contract negotiation with a vendor are started, vendor’s Initiator should submit the appropriate Request \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/index.do?orderitem=caRecommendVendorSupplierSubcontractor\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"'Recommending Vendor' \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on the EPAM Support Portal for the vendor to undergo the due diligence process and to be created in the required internal systems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When vendor’s validity is verified and all internal controls are passed, the Vendor Management Unit sets up a vendor in the database. Initiator receives appropriate notification (that a vendor is valid and recommended for further cooperation) and can start contract negotiation with a vendor. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For contract review, signing and further vendor contract maintenance procedures EPAM has developed Vendor Contract Management System (VCMS). This web application (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://contracts.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"contracts.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") is designed to fulfill a vendor contract lifecycle starting from creation to closure. At the moment, the system is available as a repository of historical vendor contracts for all EPAM regions; as a tool for contracts negotiation, the system has so far only been operational in certain locations. For more details, see \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVCMSFAQ/EPAM+Contracts\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VCMS KB page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to verify a contract, Initiator is recommended to review it with the Legal team. For your reference, there is the following Legal DL per
